RESOURCE.NAME: Lupedia Service PR
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Runs a lupedia annotation service on a GATE document

PARAMETER.NAME: threshold
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Weight threshold, matches with weights below the threshold will be filtered out. Default is set to 0.70.

PARAMETER.NAME: keepHighest
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Keep only matches with highest weight

PARAMETER.NAME: keepSpecific
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Keep only the most specific class

PARAMETER.NAME: datasets
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Datasets to match to. Leave this empty for all the datasets.

PARAMETER.NAME: keepFirstAndLongestMatch
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Keep only first and longest match at given point

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Name of the annotation set where new annotations should be created.

PARAMETER.NAME: lang
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Language in which the text is provided.

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process
